FileSearchTool: A hosted tool that lets the LLM search through a vector store. Currently only supported with OpenAI models, using the Responses API.
WebSearchTool: A hosted tool that lets the LLM search the web. Currently only supported with OpenAI models, using the Responses API.
ComputerTool: A hosted tool that lets the LLM control a computer.
CodeInterpreterTool: A tool that allows the LLM to execute code in a sandboxed environment.
ImageGenerationTool: A tool that allows the LLM to generate images.
LocalShellTool: A tool that allows the LLM to execute commands on a shell.
